ValidationRule.description: If Deal Status equals to "Published" then a Merchant Sharing Deadline must be populated - either Days or Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Deal_Status__c,"Published"), OR( AND(ISBLANK( merchant_sharing_deadline__c ),ISBLANK( merchant_sharing_deadline_date__c )), AND(NOT(ISBLANK( merchant_sharing_deadline__c )),NOT(ISBLANK( merchant_sharing_deadline_date__c ))) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Deal Status equals to "Published" then a Merchant Sharing Deadline must be populated - either Days or Date.
